name: Overthrow
description:
Overthrow is an action arcade game primarily for 2 players on the same machine. Ships race to break open capsules which release drones to help their attack. First player to die, loses!

Features
  • Frantic gameplay for two players using keyboard or supported controllers
  • Space worms, anomalies, asteroids and more give players opportunities to change their tactics and make the most of changing situations
  • A variety of AI bots give players opportunity to practice for next time they take on their friends
